description:
NOTE : the GURU level does not work .Only the first three difficulties levels that work.   
New Version : 
-Fixed some bugs ,
-App starts in full screen.
-Changed game Theme.
- Save up to six games .
-The game is saved automatically after each move even if u close the card don`t need to pause .

Chess HD is great for building concentration, memory, and strategy ability. Unlike many online chess games, this game displays the chess board in three dimensions (3D) rather than as a two-dimensional flat board. 
Click the "Click to Start" button to begin. Then choose your opponent  depending on your skill level. 
HOW TO PLAY:  To move a piece, first click the piece. This highlights the possible moves in green. Then click the square where you want the piece to move to.

This game implements all the chess rules, including castling rules, en-passant, and draw conditions on three repetitions or 50 pawn-less moves.
